name: Psi Exercises
description: Hands-on exercises to develop and refine psionic abilities.

cards.title: Sensory Expansion Drills
cards.description: Practices to heighten psionic sensory awareness.
cards.bulletpoints: Aura Reading, Empathic Sensory Expansion, Object Energy Scanning
cards.summaryText: Sweep attention across people and objects to feel subtle shifts and broaden your intuitive range.

cards.title: Telekinetic Sensory Link
cards.description: Exercises to establish a psionic link with physical objects.
cards.bulletpoints: Micro-Movements, Object Resonance, Psionic Sensory Feedback
cards.summaryText: Tether awareness to an object until you sense its micro-responses and nudge them into motion.
